title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post More info: Writing Run server More info: Server Generate static files More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites More info: Deployment

title: hexo的wikitten主题添加畅言评论
content: 先看wiki网站 芝士就是C 一、快速开始1.注册畅言，根据提示操作获取安装代码[推荐选择-自适应安装代码] 2.themes/Wikitten/layout/comment下新建changyan.ejs注意：要把<div id="SOHUCS" sid="请将此处替换为配置SourceID的语句" ></div>代码去除掉！ 3.themes/Wikitten/layout/comment下修改counter.ejs注意：我直接把disqus关键词替换成changyan，class中的我没动，若你不喜欢可以删除掉disqus-comment-count 4.themes/Wikitten/layout/comment下修改index.ejs注意：找到关键词changyan的3行 5.themes/Wikitten/layout/comment下修改script.ejs注意：找到关键词changyan的2行 6.themes/Wikitten/layout/common/post下新增changyan.ejs写入下面代码 7.themes/Wikitten/下修改_config.yaml注意：changyan: 随便给个真值就行 8.大功告成点击 芝士就是C 二、参考资料 hexo的tranquilpeak配置畅言 sourceid配置
